title: Crunchy Beef Tacos
prep: Grab your grease jar and suction thingie and set near the stove.
Put your taco shells on a plate near the microwave.
On a cutting board, shred the lettuce and sharp cheddar cheese.
Pour the black beans into  a small pot and set on the stove. Set a spoon in there for stirring later.
Dump the taco seasoning and water into a measuring cup, whisk, and set aside.
Grab a skillet and metal spatula and set near the stove.
instructions: Drop ground chuck into the skillet in chunks.
Chop and move around until cooked through (no pink).
Turn off the heat. Suction the grease out into the grease jar.
Pour the seasoning mix over the meat and stir.
Turn it up to medium until it starts bubbling, then turn to low to simmer for 5 minutes.
Turn the beans on medium low, stirring every once in a while.
